Blog.post: Well I wasn't have a very good day with my mom, so i decided to go on msn.... however that was boaring. I was getting tired of my old design (blog) and richard kept telling me to switch, so i looked at his and to my surprise it was much nicer! So for now im using this black background but that could change in minutets! haha Other than that i hope the rest of the day goes a bit better!
OMG I can't beleive this! I acually DROVE the car it was so cool though! Exept at first I burnt rubbre cuz i accidently gave gas when i switched gears.. hehe.
YAAAAAAAAAAY! OMG haha it's soo cool im totaly over reacting but WHO CARES!!!! I've got the perfect song on my website that i uploaded at EXACLY Midnight and omg haha welll I'll be busy today so ya!

YAY its summer holidays now and the exams wern't too bad!! Today was a busy day I went with Tara around an all to nanaimo to her baseball practise thing an b4 just her house! But I'm looking forward to a nice summer which I'm gonna make it!

Ok well it's really kind of grey outside... and cold! So my life is very depressing lately the last 2 weekends I havn't gone anywhere and its making me crazy! haha. I can't wait to get my normal life back... which will more than likly be the fall! So maybe until than I can live like a hippy or something!? ew nono! hehe oh well! I'm listening to alot of my old songs today, brings back memories, so thats good!

Well lately it seems as my weekends are more for relaxing than doing the things I can't normally do in the week. Oh well its not too bad, today I just cleaned a bit well alot acually, I feel like being nice the last few days, which is a good thing. I talked to Richard last night for the first time in I think is almost a week. It was only for about 15seconds or so becuase I was on the other line. I'm not sure where he is or anything but he wanted my postle code?! haha he said something about his cell phone or something he was getting a new one or a new plan. lol oh well he'll prolly send me the bill it would be just like him! haha I know he was getting a cabin for himself for a week becuase he wanted a break from his grandma's husband. He says he gets very annouying but then again everyone seems annouying to richard! Ok well I guess I'll just go enjoy the rest of the day, its going by fairly Quickly!

WOAH! I'm soo shocked this is amazing there is only like ONE more week of school plus 2 days, and only TWO weeks until my bday today YAY!!! Well I'm not too sure on what i am going to do for the next two days, but seeing as I'm soo very tired tonight I think I'll just relax and not worry about ANYTHING!! However I've just been very busy/lazy lately that would be why I havn't done anything with my website or anything but ya, I put a new song on so that always helps... and yah.

Well right now its about 10:22AM and I'm at school... in I.T. and Tim is away and its acually a VERY quite class acually the decent people are all away soo its my block with the "GEEKS" mwhahaha! oh well only another our or so! But since I'm done my work I'm just doing w/e. I've also decided that I'm gonna apply for another job today! haha this is kinda funny acually. But I supose if I can make money then its worth it right...? (well more money than i already can get/find/have) lol Incase you have noticed that my new blog page is missing a few things like my picture and so on. I am working on it I've just been a bit busy lately. Well acually no I havn't just lazy so I am planning on getting that on soon the only thing was I have to make it small so they will host it for me! EVEN tho I was already hosting it myself for them they just HAVE to make it soo stupidly confusing dont they! I gave them the URL for the pic from my website and suposidly its too big for them to store, which makes noo sence! oh well I should get around to that in a day or two!

Well since today is kinda boring... however i dunt like weekends cz everything is much busier. So I decided to clean which was kinda annouying but considering i havnt noticed anything becomming a bit cleaner i thought id do it myself, it also makes me feel better when things r nice plus i dont have to think about anything exept for wut im doing at the time. HA However i would like to do more so if ANYONE wants to do anythin whenever... call me plz! Thnx.

Well! Lately the usualy has happened... noting much... however i cant wait till sunday!!! me an richard are gunna go test drive the comming soon for sale in canada "Smart Car" (made by mercedes) urlLink www.smart.com but i mean its not expensive they figure around 16 grand or so. Hmm see we should buy three one for me one for rich an then mom would get jealous so one for her! haha naw she needs a real mercedes.... which i think she'll get next time the cool one tho.

Well yesterday was O.K. I mean it was REALLY good one out little "tour" with my grandma thats visiting, until of course my mom totaly went insane for no reason but ONLY something she brough on herself. She really isn't leaving a good impression. Maybe I can settle this on my own but then again it might take a while the longest we've been very mad is 2 weeks then everything was settled to normal but it took about 6 months to "repair" HOWEVER this isnt even HALF as bad. But in GOOD news, I'm going to see Richards new house in Qualicum Beach today HA took them long enough. Oh well.

Wow I've been oh so busy lately! It's insane rele, oh well this has become such an inconvience over time! Anyways my driving is much better lol an i got my licence in the mail an OMG its the WORST picture I have EVER seen!!!!! hahaha

Ok well sorry I have been gone for a long time I was up at the lake with Tara an her family. I also forgot my cell phone in my car when I got to her house that day, someone acually thought i was dead an even missing. HA omg! oh well I'm not so not to worry! Oh I forgot another VERY important thing my camera but thats not surprising however its not good becuase of my new picture section.

HAhaha omg well some already know that I'm going to Kitchener Ontario (hour from totonto) for the next 6 months (possibly yr) to live with my grandma on my dads side. Soooooooo today im going out with chelsea ritchie an um yaa that should be nice we're goin for dinner at the bayside cuz im sick of kalvas they're a bit too german an snobby hehe.

Oh right... mmk then.... well since its friday at 7:30AM an i havn't slept at all its pretty crazy!!! meh maybe tonight? Yes 4sure i ended up watching the paird advertising for these beds at 5 HAhaha. Oh well yesterday was acually i busy day which was good for a change I suppose.
